pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot of a powerful supercell thunderstorm forming over a vast, flat, green field. The dramatic, dark clouds churn and swirl as the storm system evolves. Rain can be seen falling in the distance as the entire formation moves across the horizon.
